law.catch_line: A complaint seeking forfeiture shall contain:...

text.section: Within 20 days after the filing of the complaint, copies of the summons and complaint shall be sent by certified mail requesting "restricted delivery - show to whom, date, address of delivery" and first-class mail to all known owners and lienholders whose identities are reasonably subject to discovery, including all real property owners and lienholders shown in the records required by law for notice or perfection of the lien.
